store.name: Kanjo x Spirit
store.tagline: Underground Osaka energy, reborn in Edmonton.

products.title: Oversized Hoodie - "No Good Spirit"
products.description: Homage to underground Osaka: front stencil chest logo; back EG rear-quarter illustration with graffiti overlay. Inner label: Built in the shadows of Osaka. Reborn in Edmonton.
products.tagline: We run from the cops, not the culture.
products.details: Drop-shoulder oversized fit. Heavy fleece blank recommended.

products.title: Vinyl Decal Set - "Kanjo Code"
products.description: Sticker pack with crew tag, kanji slogans, and Osaka plate style. Weather-resistant die-cut vinyl.
products.tagline: Daily-carry culture for cars, laptops, toolboxes.

products.title: 3x5 Flag - "Late Night Cruise Club"
products.description: Black flag with EF powerslide and RUN OR DIE kanji. Single-sided polyester with grommets.
